title: Riot games league client right now

replies.body: How you gonna land is the question we should be asking. Or do we have to die?

> [{quoted}](name=Haedrig,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jOLGuuZ5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-11-14T21:54:48.710+0000)
>
> How you gonna land is the question we should be asking. Or do we have to die?

You're forced to crash just like the client :')

> [{quoted}](name=Haedrig,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jOLGuuZ5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-11-14T21:54:48.710+0000)
>
> How you gonna land is the question we should be asking. Or do we have to die?

It took off just like a normal plane. Something has happened along the way. Something terrible.
They flew thorugh Chernobyl and the plane mutated
how did it even start flying

> [{quoted}](name=WyvernEgg,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jOLGuuZ5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-14T19:55:15.988+0000)
>
> how did it even start flying

same as how is the client still working.
If you truly believe in yourself, everything is possible.
i ve found a fix for this,delete or rename \Riot Games\Riot Client then go to Riot Games\League of Legends and start leagueclient

the game will try to redownload the flawed client when you close the game,so you have to re do this always
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

> [{quoted}](name=SupërMëwKitty,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jOLGuuZ5,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-11-15T07:53:42.087+0000)
>
> i ve found a fix for this,delete or rename \Riot Games\Riot Client then go to Riot Games\League of Legends and start leagueclient

I have found a fix too... uninstall the game until Riot figures it out and stop being mindlessly addicted to something that doesn't work.
nah,just do what i did and everything will go smooth

That's what happens when you build it with

https://i.imgur.com/s66ERw2.jpg[]
When you start laughing cuz you think the post is funny, then start crying when you realize its true :'D

at least the plane is able to launch.
more than i can say from riots client.
i like my clients al dente

For me it's not even a problem of the client, I could deal with that, but the problem is that my average ping the last month (and especially this week) has been between 200 and 500, and my fps this week has started dropping to 15 at times
